prcbench
  • Introduction
  • Reference

Base class of performance evaluation tools

ToolIFBase is an abstract class to provide a uniform interface for performance evaluation tools.

ToolIFBase

Format

An R6 class object

Methods

  • call(testset, calc_auc, store_res): It calls an actual tool to calculate Precision-Recall curves.
    testset
    R6 object generated by the create_testset function.
    calc_auc
    A Boolean value to specify whether the AUC score should be calculated.
    store_res
    A Boolean value to specify whether the calculated curve is retrieved and stored.

  • get_toolname(): Get the name of the tool.
  • set_toolname(toolname): Set the name of the tool.
  • get_setname(): Get the name of the tool set.
  • set_setname(setname): Set the name of the tool set.
  • get_result(): Get a list with curve values and the AUC score.
  • get_x(): Get calculated recall values.
  • get_y(): Get calculated precision values.
  • get_auc(): Get tne AUC score.
.

See also

ToolROCR, ToolAUCCalculator, ToolPerfMeas, ToolPRROC, and Toolprecrec are derived from this class. create_toolset for creating a list of tools.
